p: The chemical composition of extracted A. annua essential oil is presented in Table 1. We identified 55 compounds in flowers of this plant, which represent 93.0% of the total composition. Camphor (13.1%), artemisia ketone (11.8%), β-selinene (10.7%), pinocarvone (7.4%), 1,8-cineole (6.8%), and α-pinene (5.9%) were considered as the major compounds detected, all of which are terpenes. However, other groups such as ester and phenylpropene were also recognized ( Table 1).
